result.title: MO algoritm masalalari
result.content:
2012-2013 Тренировочное соревнование Винницкого национального технического университета №1 — C(Самая простая задача);
Bu masalada dastlab 644-Qayta qiymatlash masalasidagi kabi massiv elementlarini qayta qiymatlab olish kerak.

http://codeforces.com/contest/86/problem/D
http://codeforces.com/group/Q35x1MhG1Q/contest/101059/problem/D
http://codeforces.com/contest/617/problem/E
http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/351/D


HakerEarth
Sherlock and Inversions
Kriti and her birthday gift
SUBSTRINGS COUNT

Har xil sonlar
#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

struct query {
    int L, R, block, ind;
};
bool cmp(query A, query B) {
    return A.block< B.block || (A.block==B.block && A.R < B.R);
}
int a[100001];
query b[100001];
int cnt[100001];
int res[100001];
int ans = 0;
void remove(int i) {
    cnt[a[i]]--;
    if (cnt[a[i]]==0)
        ans--;
}
void add(int i) {
    cnt[a[i]]++;
    if (cnt[a[i]]==1)
        ans++;
}
int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        cin >> a[i];
    }
    int k = sqrt(n);
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        cin >> b[i].L >> b[i].R;
        b[i].block = (b[i].L-1) / k;
        b[i].ind = i;
    }
    sort(b+1, b+m+1, cmp);
    int curL = 1, curR = 1;
    add(1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        int L = b[i].L;
        int R = b[i].R;
        while (L > curL) {
            remove(curL);
            curL++;
        }
        while (L < curL) {
            curL--;
            add(curL);
        }
        while (R > curR) {
            curR++;
            add(curR);
        }
        while (R < curR) {
            remove(curR);
            curR--;
        }
        res[b[i].ind] = ans;
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        cout << res[i] << endl;
    }
}
/*
7 5
2 2 1 2 3 3 3
1 3
2 4
5 7
1 7
2 5
*/
